name: Fiery Wall of Protection Oil
description:
The world is full of negative energies that we tend to absorb as we journey through it.  

This traditional New Orleans hoodoo oil will provide a wall between you and outside influences.  Add it to your arsenal of spiritual and psychic self-defense by using this oil to dress a protection mojo bag, doors and windows, desks and other places where you feel the need for added protection.  

Or put a little on a little piece of cloth or cotton and wear it on your person or in a locket.

In a 10 ml amber glass bottle.

(Due to the ingredients, this blend is not skin-safe.)

name: Protection Mojo Bag
description:
Hoodoo Kitty has created this hand-sewn white mojo bag, closed  with black thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen to provide you with a wall of protection.

Decorated with an anchor charm to keep you safe on your journeys, whether to work or around the world.

Carry your mojo bag on your person so it can provide the most benefit.

Approximately 2" x 3".  Each mojo bag is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your mojo bag will arrive in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Love Draw Mojo Bag
description:
Hoodoo Kitty has created this hand-sewn red mojo bag, closed  with pink thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen to draw love into your life.

Decorated with a heart charm.

Carry your mojo bag on your person until you find your heart's desire.

Approximately 2" x 3".  Each mojo bag is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your mojo bag will arrive with instructions in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Money Draw Mojo Bag
description:
Hoodoo Kitty has created this hand-sewn green mojo bag, closed with yellow thread and filled with ingredients chosen to draw money into your life.

Each bag contains a lucky lodestone.

Decorated with a money drawing charm.

Carry your mojo bag with you to improve your finances and increase prosperity.

Approximately 3" x 2".  Each mojo bag is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your mojo bag will arrive with instructions in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Gambler's Luck Mojo Bag
description:
Hoodoo Kitty has created this hand-sewn red mojo bag, closed  with green thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen to increases your chances when gambling.

Each bag contains a lucky mercury dime.

Decorated with a good luck charm.

Carry your mojo bag on your person when playing the lottery and games of chance.

Approximately 2" x 3".  Each mojo bag is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your mojo bag will arrive in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Uncrossing Guard Poppet
description:
Ever felt like the universe is working against you?  Like there is a black cloud over your head?  Like you might be cursed?

This black and white reversing voodoo doll is trimmed in grey thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen remove hexes, curses and negative energy.

Decorated with button eyes and a two-faced bone skull charm to send the evil back to whoever sent it.

Pin your request to your doll and put him in place of honour.  Talk to him daily, tell him what you need and watch the results. 

Approximately 4" x 6".  Each doll is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your poppet will arrive with instructions in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Work Fix Poppet
description:
This purple voodoo doll is trimmed in black thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen to improve your work environment.

Decorated with button eyes and a hamsa charm to protect you from the evil eye.

Pin your request or the name of your employer to your doll's heart and put him in place of honour.  Talk to him daily, tell him what you need and watch the results. 

Approximately 4" x 6".  Each doll is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your poppet will arrive with instructions in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Red Fast Luck Poppet
description:
This red voodoo doll is trimmed in white thread and stuffed with ingredients in Zora Neal Hurston's traditional recipe for Red Fast Luck Oil.

Decorated with button eyes and a good luck charm to bring some luck into your life.

Pin your requests and wishes to his heart and put him in place of honour.  Talk to him daily, tell him what you need and watch the results. 

Approximately 4" x 6".  Each doll is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your poppet will arrive with instructions in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Road Opener Poppet
description:
This red and black poppet is trimmed in cream thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen to clear blockages and draw new opportunities into your life.

Decorated with button eyes and a key charm.

Pin your request to your poppet and put him in place of honour.  Talk to him daily, tell him what you need and watch the results. 

Approximately 4" x 6".  Each doll is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your poppet will arrive with instructions in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Money Draw Poppet
description:
This green poppet is trimmed in black thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen to draw money into your life.

Each poppet contains a lucky loadstone.

Decorated with button eyes and a money bag charm.

Pin your request to your poppet and put him in place of honour.  Talk to him daily, tell him what you need and watch the results. 

Approximately 4" x 6".  Each doll is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your poppet will arrive in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Crown of Success Poppet
description:
This bright yellow poppet is trimmed in royal purple thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen to draw success into your life.

Decorated with button eyes and a crown charm.

Pin your request to your poppet and put him in place of honour.  Talk to him daily, tell him what you need and watch the results. 

Approximately 4" x 6".  Each doll is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your poppet will arrive with instructions in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Begone! Poppet
description:
Desperate times call for desperate measures.

This black poppet is trimmed in cream thread and stuffed with ingredients chosen to protect you and banish someone from your life.

Decorated with button eyes and a skull charm.

To use his power, pin the name of the intended person to your voodoo doll, wrap him in twine or rope and bury him far from home. 

(Or don't and just keep him.  He's super cute.) 

Approximately 4" x 6".  Each doll is hand-cut, hand-stitched and completely unique.  This means the item in the picture may not be the one you receive.

Your poppet will arrive with instructions in a hand-stamped muslin bag.

name: Lucky Lodestone Oil
description:
Our traditional Van Van oil with the added power of a lodestone to draw even more luck and positive energy into your life. 

Use this oil for dressing candles, mojo bags or an item you carry on your person.

A pinch of magnetic sand has been added to each vial to keep the lodestone fed and happy.  

In a 10 ml amber glass bottle.

name: Van Van Oil
description:
Van Van oil is a traditional New Orleans formula to help draw positive luck and good fortune into your life.  

It's often used to dress mojo bags, amulets and good luck charms.  Use this oil for dressing candles, your wallet or a personal item you carry with you.

Hoodoo Kitty's blend uses an authentic recipe that includes Lemongrass but she's added Five Finger Grass to ward off evil and attract good luck.

In a 10 ml amber glass bottle.

name: High John the Conqueror Oil
description:
A traditional hoodoo dressing oil used to enhance your personal power.  Legend has it that this root draws love, luck and success into your life.

Aged for a full moon cycle, each vial contains a piece of High John the Conqueror root.  Use this oil for dressing candles, mojo bags or an item you carry on your person.

(This is not a scented perfume oil.)  

In a 10 ml amber glass bottle.

name: Red Fast Luck Oil
description:
Made from Zora Neal Hurston's traditional recipe for Red Fast Luck Oil.

An all-purpose oil for drawing luck, love and money into your life.  Use for dressing candles, mojo bags, dolls, the bills in your wallet or your wallet itself.  Dab some on a scarf or another item you carry with you.

In a 10 ml amber glass bottle.

* Due to the high concentration of authentic essential oils used, this product is not safe to be worn as a perfume.

name: Stop Gossip Powder
description:
Hoodoo Kitty's Curiosities has created a traditional hoodoo blend to stop gossip and back-biting.

Sprinkle this powder in the four corners of your office, home or anywhere you feel attacked.  You can even sprinkle it across doorways for a little foot track magic.

In a 10 ml glass vial.  Cork topped.  Wax sealed.

name: Hot Foot Powder
description:
From time to time, someone just needs to go away.  Think of a stalker, ex-lover, nosy neighbour. That's where this handy powder comes in.

Hot Foot Powder is foot track magic and it means business.  Sprinkle this where you know your enemy will step to remove this person from your life.

(Be careful not to cross the powder and accidentally "hot foot" yourself. And remember to wash your hands after use.) 

In a 10 ml glass vial. Cork topped. Wax sealed.
